attributes.action: Ban penalty charges for non direct-debit payers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It is unfair to force honest bill payers to pay by a means preferred by an unscrupulous company. As long as a method is legal it should be accepted without penalty. For those on fixed, low, or insecure incomes it is ill-advised for them to use direct debits. This is just another way of
 making the poorest in society finance discounts for the well-off (proven by the fact direct debit payers receive a discount).

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
